participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and creative, with a strong passion for music and family.
participant_1.background: I visited my sister in Canada last fall. I live in the United States. I work for the Navy. I'm not sure I could pick just one, but building a house for my family was definitely one of the hardest things I've ever done. I am an aspiring singer.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Analytical and sociable, with a love for exploring the dynamics of relationships.
participant_2.background: I loved playing outside with my friends and riding my bike. I live in a big city where I can be more anonymous, but I still need to go back to my hometown to take care of my parents. I like to analyze my friends' behavior and try to understand their motivations. I love my family, but they don't always understand my love for McDonald's or Mortal Kombat. I moved to America when I was 14.

content.text: It's going well! How about yours?
It's going great! I just finished writing a song.
Oh wow, that's awesome! What kind of song is it?
It's a country song about my love for my family.
That sounds really sweet! I love country music.
Me too! I grew up listening to it with my family.
I grew up in a small town in the Midwest, so country music was always on the radio.
I'm from the Midwest too! I'm from Missouri.
Oh, that's cool! I'm from Illinois.
That's not too far away! I've been to Illinois a few times.
Me too! I've been to Missouri a few times too.
It's always nice to meet someone from the Midwest.
Me too! It's nice to talk to someone who understands the culture.
Definitely! I love talking about country music and the Midwest.
Me too! We should talk more sometime.
